i18n.key: This is the email address for the Google Analytics account.
This is the password for the Google Analytics account.

This ID can be found in the URL of the "edit" link that enables defining the parameters of a site profile. For example, in the URL "https://www.google.com/analytics/settings/profile_summary?id=123456", the ID is "123456".
